description: Ammunition for a Rifle. Loses velocity when fired over long distances resulting in slightly decreased damage.
A small 8x zoom scope.
Ammunition for a Shotgun.
Incendiary Shotgun Ammunition
Single large projectile for a Shotgun.
Ammunition for a 40mm Grenade Launcher.
Ammunition for a 40mm Grenade Launcher.
Ammunition for a 40mm Grenade Launcher.
A stupid barrel costume, so you can hide like a pro..p
A large wooden pool that can be filled with water.
A waterlogged assault rifle from the abyss
A divers suit found in the abyss, doubles as a reliable hazmat suit
Horizontal Abyss container taken from the depths of the ocean
Metal hatchet, reclaimed from the abyss, perfect for survival and crafting
Plucked from the abyss, this Metal Pickaxe is a prized possession for any survivor
Illuminate the underwater depths with this durable and waterproof diving torch
Vertical Abyss container taken from the depths of the ocean
A classic acoustic guitar, built for jam sessions around campfires at night.
An advanced tea that provides some hydration and temporarily increases your resistance to radiation a moderate amount.
An advanced cooling tea, provides hydration and temporarily decreases your max and core temperature.
An advanced crafting tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases the chances of a higher quality crafting outcome.
An advanced harvesting tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts the amount of resources you receive from harvesting corpses a moderate amount.
An advanced healing tea, provides hydration and heals you a moderate amount over time.
An advanced health tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts maximum health a moderate amount.
An advanced ore tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases your yield from ores a moderate amount.
A tea that removes some radiation.
An advanced scrap tea, temporarily increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels a moderate amount.
An advanced warming tea that temporarily increases both your core and minimum temperature.
An advanced wood tea, temporarily increases the yield from cutting trees a moderate amount.
Receive a special gift each and every day!
A small bony fish commonly found in large schools.
A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if BOTH inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source
Harvested from animals, combine with cloth to create a low quality fuel source.
Taking these pills will lower your radiation level. WARNING: May cause extreme dehydration.
An Apple. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A delicious apple pie, always too hot. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Gives better night vision, including tree markings and ore hotspots, for a short time.
A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
An arctic variant of the hazmat suit which trades radiation for cold protection.
Single module armored cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
Extremely strong door with a hatch to see and shoot out of.
Extremely strong door with a hatch to see and shoot out of.
Single module armored seating for two passengers.
Asbestos insert providing extra protection from heat for crafted clothes and armor.
High damage machine rifle.
A fairly solid helicopter with weapons capability.
A speaker which will emit a loud warning alarm when powered

This automated electric sentry turret will engage and neutralize any moving targets it has line of sight to. You must equip it with a projectile weapon and the corresponding ammunition. Note : The turret will search for targets in a 180 degree arc facing *you* when you place it. Requires 10 power.
A stationary ballista, perfect for defence. Can fire deadly bolts at distant targets.
Keep your things in this bamboo barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.
Bamboo shelves for item stacking
Heal yourself or others with this bandage. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.
A square of cloth which is tied around the face over the nose and mouth.
A bandit guard suit
A wooden barricade with barbed wire, made of Wood and Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.
A makeshift Barbeque. You can cook significant amounts of food with this.
A baseball bat wrapped in barbed wire
Simple hat for your head. Offers basic protection from damage and the cold.
A basic tea that provides hydration and temporarily increases your resistance to radiation a small amount.
A basic cooling tea that temporarily decreases your max and core temperature.
A basic crafting tea. provides hydration and increases the chances of a higher quality crafting outcome for a short time.
A basic harvesting tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases the amount of resources you receive from harvesting corpses a small amount.
A basic healing tea, provides hydration and heals you a small amount over time.
Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed
A basic health tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts maximum health a small amount.
A basic ore tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases your yield from harvesting ores a small amount.
A basic scrap tea, temporarily increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels a small amount.
A basic warming tea that temporarily increases both your core and minimum temperature.
A basic wood tea, temporarily increases the yield from cutting trees a small amount.
A small planter with enough room to plant 3 seeds.
A reinforced siege weapon built for smashing through wooden and stone constructions with brute force. Must be repaired with high quality metal to keep functioning.
A Battery.
The Beach Chair is the best way to relax, whether it's by the pool or on the beach.
A large umbrella that will shield you from the sun.
A small table to hold your drinks while relaxing.
A colourful beach towel. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.
An unreliable explosive grenade. Each one has a different length fuse, so you might lose some fingers. Can be used to make satchel charges.
A pie made of bear meat, provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Increases effect of harvesting teas but reduces their duration.
A Bed. Placing this will give you a place to respawn and can be used much more frequently than a sleeping bag. Note: Must be placed inside a building.
A bunch of Bee Grenades in a single catapult projectile. Creates swarms of Bees on impact.
A fragile glass jar full of bees. Breaking upon impact, the bees will find the nearest player to attack. Careful where you throw it!
Hand made beehive, place a nucleus inside to raise your own bees and produce honeycomb. Happy bees will make honeycomb more quickly.
The heart of any hive, needed for raising bees. Produce honeycomb from happy bees to grow the nucleus and increase yields.
A wooly hat, offering some basic protection from damage and cold for your head.
A pedal bike.
A pie made from jungle cat meat, purrfect temperature. Boosts hunger, health and hydration. Shows nearby animal tracks for a short time.
Binoculars allowing you to see objects at great length.
A very special and happy birthday to Rust!
A black berry.
A clipping of a Black Berry Plant.

These black berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.
Black Raspberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A powerful oxidizing agent. Can be used as a disinfectant.
This object prevents passthrough while power is received through its second input.
Used in creation of medkits.
A blown weapon that fires darts with different effects.
Blueberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A blue berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.
A clipping of a Blue Berry Plant.

These blue berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.
A very large mortar type firework with a blue starburst
Blue Dog Tags
Blue ID Tag
A small blue light source.
A Blue Jumpsuit
A keycard with medium level clearance.
Blueprint
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Blue balls into the air
A Shotgun with two barrels allowing two shots to be fired in quick succession before needing to reload.
A High powered, highly accurate, long range rifle.
A primitive suit of armor made of bones, weak protection from damage and the elements but better than nothing.
An Arrow equipped with a large bone arrowhead making it very easy to hit targets at the expense of damage
A blunt weapon made from a femur. All around basic gathering tool.
A basic damage dart.
Extracted from animal carcass. Used as a raw material to make bone weapons and armour.
A primitive helmet made from bone. Moderate protection from projectiles and melee damage.
Melee weapon crafted from bone fragments. Good for harvesting carcases.
Use the boogie board to catch some sick waves.
A large speaker to play recorded cassette tapes which can also stream audio from the internet. Open the settings to change audio options.
Can be used a melee weapon or as a throwable. Once thrown (with right click) it travels in an arc before coming back to you.
A boonie hat, offering minor protection from damage and cold for your head.
Sturdy work boots to keep your toes safe, you'd feel nothing if you kicked a table leg. Strong protection against the cold and incoming damage.
A canteen used to carry Water. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out.
A loaf of bread, eating it provides a boost to health, hunger and hydration. Feeding to a horse will provide a boost to its digestion and dung production for a short time.
Metal window bars made to fit a brick skin sized window.
A Bronze Egg. Open for a surprise or collect 10 to upgrade to a silver egg.
A Bucket Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.
A building plan. You can use this to craft buildings - right click when equipped for more options.
Bunny Ears. Grants additional Egg Vision allowing you to detect more eggs during an Easter egg hunt.
A silly Bunny Hat with wobbly ears to celebrate Easter 2021
A Bunny Onesie. Grants additional Egg Vision allowing you to detect more eggs during an Easter egg hunt.
Basic burlap gloves, offering protection from the elements
A Headwrap made out of burlap.
A Shirt made out of burlap.
Shoes made out of burlap.
Trousers made out of burlap.
Bear Meat that has been overcooked.
Burned chicken. Eating it will damage your health.
Burned Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health.
Burned horse meat. Eating it will damage your health.
Burned Meat from a human being. Consuming will damage your health.
This little piggy has been in the oven for too long.
Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
A weapon attachment that modifies recoil and rate of fire. Allows weapon to fire in 3 round bursts when turned on. Use [+firemode] to toggle on or off.
A sharp butcher knife. Extremely good at harvesting flesh from both dead or alive bodies.
A simple electric button.
Allows you to pass a cable through a wall. Each input will forward the amount it receives to the corresponding output on the other side.
Flesh of a Cactus, contains water.
A camera. Take screenshots with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and lock focus with third fire.
Dual module camper that allows up to 4 players to respawn. Also includes a barbecue, a locker and a small box for item storage.
A small camp fire. Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.
A selection of crumpled cans assembled into a ring to produce some great background percussion.
A hat with a candle on top. You can turn the candle on in your inventory.
A very old candy cane from 2014
Smash some faces with this large piece of candy
Beans found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
Chunked tuna found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A deteriorating piece of paper with information relating to the last moments of this vessel.
A fake moustache for Movember
A table for playing card games
A key to a car, created at a vehicle lift. Keep this item safe; if lost you'll be unable to drive the car again!
A small radio to use in cars. Will only work while the car is turned on.
A pumpkin that you can carve. Requires wood as a fuel source.
A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 30s of audio.
A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 20s of audio.
Insert a cassette and play the recorded audio with [attack], [attack2] to record new audio and [+reload] to throw.
A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 10s of audio.
An improvised catapult siege weapon. Built for flinging destructive projectiles with questionable accuracy. Can be towed by horses.
A large, whiskered fresh water based predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.
A CCTV Camera system can be used for realtime surveillance and security around your base when powered and paired with the Computer Station.
A small ceiling mounted light source.
A Chainlink Fence.
A Chainlink Fence Gate.
A Chainsaw. Very effective at cutting trees in addition to soft fleshy objects. Requires Low Grade Fuel to run.
Every home needs a chair. A decorative item which provides comfort while seated.
A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts
Byproduct from campfires and furnaces used for crafting gunpowder.
An enclosure to keep some chickens around. Chickens with plenty of food, water and sunlight produce more eggs.
An inflatable chicken costume. Acting as a replacement for wooden pants, you can equip this item to look as silly as possible.
Just like mom used to make. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Increases the chance of better genes from crops for short time.
A decorative Paper lantern
A decorative White Paper lantern
An Arcade Machine
Chocolate Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
Get into the christmas spirit with this holiday door wreath.
A string of colored lights to decorate your home
Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative Christmas tree
A table for managing clans.
Special helmet for players who own Clatter and have played for at least 30 minutes, replaces the bucket helmet.
Cloth from an animal or a Hemp Bush. Used in many clothing items, weapons, and more.
Crappy Holidays!
Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger.
Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger, with a small engine.
A shoddy piece of body armor made from coconut and plants, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.
Hand protection made of bark and plants, offers some protection to the upper body.
A shoddy helmet made from coconut, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.
A shoddy piece of leg armor made from coconut and plants, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.
An electronic lock. Locked and unlocked with four-digit code.
A Coffee Can Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.
An old wooden coffin, can store up to 42 items
Combat knife designed for close combat engagements, can attack while sprinting. Best in class at harvesting flesh.
A block that runs commands
Produces fertilizer from compostable items.
A very powerful bow. Can only be fully drawn while stationary. Keep still for bonus damage and speed.
A Computer station for remote control access
A barricade made out of Stones.
A salvaged piece of concrete and rebar which can be used to harvest wood
A salvaged piece of concrete and rebar with a sharp edge. Can be used to harvest Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore.
Blast a cloud of birthday themed confetti cheer.
A small speaker that will play any audio from a connected Boom Box.
Delicious Bear Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Delicious Big Cat Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Cooked chicken. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Delicious Crocodile Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Cooked Deer Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Cooked Fish. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
Cooked Horse Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Salty meat from a human being, eating this will restore some hunger and health but reduces hydration. Maybe you should look for a better food source.
Cooked pork, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Delicious Snake Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.
Used to cook advanced recipes for food, fuel, ammunition and explosives.
An ear of corn. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A Clipping of a Corn Plant.

Corn seeds can be found when picking wild Corn plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more corn and faster growth.
A basic cathode ray tube screen combined with an incremental counter. Can display power received, or can count upwards and allow passthrough when a target is reached.
A road sign that's been repurposed to produce some beautiful, calming, percussion.
A sneaky crate costume. Use with a friend to expertly troll other players
A pie made from crocodile meat, may cause a reptile dysfunction. Boosts hunger, health and hydration. Gives better night vision, including tree markings and ore hotspots, for a short time.
A very accurate ranged weapon.
Raw Oil out of the ground, must be refined in a refinery to be used.
Cultist Deer Torch
A spooky cast iron cauldron with a green goo.
A rapid-firing Machine Gun. Sacrifices accuracy and distance for speed.
Decorative Baubels you can hang on your Christmas tree
Decorative Gingerbread Men you can hang on your Christmas tree
Decorative Pinecones you can hang on your Christmas tree
Decorative Plastic Candy Canes you can hang on your Christmas tree
Decorative Tinsel you can hang on your Christmas tree
Colored, Animated, Powered Lights. Requires 5 electricity. Click to start placement, right click to end. Each unit is 0.5m long.
Suitable fuel to power quarries and the giant excavator.
A digital clock that displays the server time and lets you set alarms to pass power through when ringing. Ideal for synchronizing traps or timed events.
Get groovy with this stunning disco ball.
A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.
A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.
A companion that reminds you of your youth.
A personal underwater propulsion device
Diving Fins. Significantly boosts your speed underwater but greatly reduces mobility on land.
A diving mask that provides clear vision under water at the cost of reduced peripheral vision.
An oxygen tank that enables breathing under water for a period of time. Can be refilled at a workbench.
A stack of technical looking documents.
Neutral Dog Tag
Automatically closes your doors when left open.
A Door Controller. Will manipulate the state of the closest door when it receives power
A key to a door, created from a Lock. Keep this item safe; if lost you'll be unable to open the door again!
A Shotgun with two barrels allowing two shots to be fired in quick succession before needing to reload.
A horse saddle with two seats. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the "Claim" option
A double sign post that you can plant into terrain.
A robustly thick outer garment providing ample protection to the wearer.
A classic halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.
A heavy brass door knocker
A special dragon mask to celebrate Chinese New Year
Unmatched craftsmanship meets devastating firepower.
A remote controlled drone operated from the Computer station with a limited range. Easily damaged from impacts.
This item can be deployed on walls so that players can input items from the exterior of the building for safe keeping. You can only access the submitted contents of the Drop Box from the rear.
A versatile adhesive tape reinforced with cloth.
A small two-person submarine.
A beautiful, hand crafted Easter themed door wreath.
An egg laid by a chicken, will hatch in a coop. Can be eaten raw but best saved for a recipe.
An easter egg basket. Equip to pick up eggs during an easter egg hunt with left click. Use right click to throw
An eggsquisite egg costume, can be painted when unequipped.
A 1-meter by 0.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.
An electrical version of a furnace that uses electricity instead of a fuel source.
An unreliable electric fuse. Will allow electrical passthrough for a period of time.
Provides warmth in a radius when on
A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.
An empty Can of Beans. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.
Strong metal object.
An empty Can of Tuna. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.
This allows you to craft and unlock electrical, water and industrial items
Single module large engine.
A very cheap, very ineffective, and very unreliable pistol that fires shells.
This ammo explodes on contact dealing a small amount of fragmentation damage to nearby objects.
A component used for crafting C4 and Rockets.
Larger magazine size
A reliable military grenade that can be thrown a short distance. Deadly at close range on detonation.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives. Contains a bulletproof viewing portal
Helps plants grow by increasing ground condition. Produced in a composter.
A Festive decoration to spruce up your doorway during the holdiays!
A Festive decoration to spruce up your double doorway during the holidays!
A Festive decoration to spruce up your windows during the holdiays!
A fuel soaked arrow, ignite it by aiming.
A crude firebomb made of fuel-filled jugs wrapped in a net. Can be placed or used as a projectile in a catapult.
Happy Lunar New Year!
Fishing Tackle
Delightful fish pie. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Increases base comfort level for a short time.
A wall mountable item to show off your greatest catches. Fish not included.
A Flamethrower. Uses low grade fuel as ammunition.
Automated Flame turret. Requires Low Grade Fuel. Sprays flames when triggered.
Light up the night sky with this brand new red flare!
A bright explosive device which blinds and disorients anyone near it upon detonation
A flashing blue light
A powerful flashlight which illuminates your surroundings and can be used as a weapon.
Single module flatbed.
A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.
A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.
Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.
Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.
A simple switch that enables fluid to pass through. Can be switched on/off manually or via electricity. Can also pump water upwards to higher entities when powered.
A Fog machine which runs on low grade fuel. Can be set to fill an area with a dense fog or triggered by motion.
Frankenstein halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.
Place a monsters head, torso and legs into the table to summon Frankensteins monster.
A fridge you can store food into!
Thank you for playing the game through its early access run. Enjoy these boots made from radiation resistant frog rubber.
Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.
A Frontier Hatchet, useful for chopping trees and dismembering corpses.
Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.
Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.
A large wooden frontier themed mirror
A medium wood frontier themed mirror
A small wooden frontier themed mirror
A standing wooden frontier themed mirror
A Frontier suit
Dual module large fuel tank.
A Furnace. Use it to smelt mined ore.
A garage door that rolls up and down.
Celebrating 15 Years of Garry's Mod! Use this tool gun to upgrade building parts. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.
An internal weapon mod which compresses and directs gasses used for cycling the weapon to the barrel, effectively increasing projectile velocity and damage at the expense of cycle rate.
A Gas Mask
A selection of gears. Some functional, some not.
A geiger counter used by scientists
Generic vehicle chassis
Generic vehicle module
Definitely not a last minute costume idea.
Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative inflated giant candy cane
Get into the holiday spirit with these decorative giant lollipops
A suit made of gingerbread, slightly crunchy.
glowing eyes
A strong adhesive.
A Gold Egg. Containing the best easter loot.
A large gold frame
A medium gold frame
A small gold frame
A standing gold frame
A large gold mirror
A medium gold mirror
A small gold mirror
A standing gold mirror
Granola Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger.
A Gravestone marking the remains of an unknown soul
A Spooky Fence
Gray ID Tag
A green berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.
A clipping of a Green Berry Plant.

These green berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.
A very large mortar type firework with a green starburst
Green ID Tag
A small green light source.
A low level clearance card granting access to basic areas.
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Green balls into the air
A pale, fleshy insect that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.
Made from Sulfur and Charcoal, a key ingredient of anything that goes bang!
Half height salvaged bamboo shelves for stacking
Some loose halloween candy Collect 10 to upgrade to a Small Loot Bag!
A Hammer, used to upgrade building materials. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.
Heavy and solid bolt for a ballista, designed to hammer through doors.
You're under arrest! Use on a surrendering or wounded player to keep them restrained. The wearer is blocked from using or holding items and can be pushed around.
Use [attack2] to cast out the line and wait for a bite. Requires bait.
Shoddy ammo with multiple projectiles.
An extremely basic automatic firearm. Low damage and accuracy.
A Hatchet, useful for chopping trees and dismembering corpses.
A plushy of your favourite outfit made by the fabulous people at YouTooz.com
A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
Hazmat Youtooz
A Heartbeat, Breathing, Humidity and Footstep sensor. Passthrough is equal to the number of humans detected in a 10m radius
A sack containing the head of a defeated foe. Can be added to trophies.
Every gamer needs a headset! - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.
Slightly slower, slightly stronger. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
Slightly slower, slightly stronger. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
Slightly slower, slightly stronger. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
Offers superior protection at the cost of reduced vision and movement speed.
Offers superior protection at the cost of aiming down sights and reduced movement speed.
Offers superior protection at the cost of reduced movement speed.
A heavy hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
Heavy Scientist Youtooz
A clipping of a hemp plant.

Hemp seeds can be found when picking wild Hemp. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional cloth. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more cloth and faster growth.
A small fish commonly found in a variety of water sources.
Simple hide boots, made with common materials. Basic all-round protection.
A Halterneck made from the hide of an animal.
Trousers made from the hide of an animal. Moderate protection against animal attacks.
Primitive armour for the chest made from animal skin. One size fits all. Offers some basic protection from damage and the elements.
Simple hide skirt, made with common materials. Basic all-round protection.
Simple hide vest, made with common materials. Basic all-round protection.
A powerful six-shot revolver using 5.56 rounds. High damage and accuracy, but slow fire rate and even slower to reload.
A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.
A high wooden gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.
A legacy themed wooden gate to keep the untamed wilderness away from your property, it's seen better days. Replaces the High External Wooden Wall.
A legacy themed wooden wall to keep the untamed wilderness away from your property, made with questionable carpentry. Replaces the High External Wooden Wall.
A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.
A high wooden gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.
A high wooden wall used to keep people off your property.
A very high ice wall to protect your property.
A high quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.
A high quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.
Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed
High quality metal suitable for armor and weapons construction.
A rock containing High Quality Metal. Can be smelted in a furnace.
High quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.
High quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
High quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
Lighter, faster arrow that deals less damage.
Fast moving rocket ammunition. Short to medium range self-propelled, unguided rocket which deals large splash damage on impact but less damage than a normal rocket.
A Hitching post and Trough. Dismounting your horses here will keep them healthy and fed as long as it is kept stocked with food.
A hand made belt-fed light machine gun with high damage, high rate of fire, low accuracy during short bursts.
A vagabond staple. Use this repurposed oil barrel to stay warm.
A protective facemask which provides the user with excellent head protection from all forms of attacks.
Uses laser projection to create a holographic sight which is always pointing at the target regardless of view angle.
Homemade Landmine. If you stand on one, you can ask a friend to disarm it before it explodes.
Fast moving rocket ammunition. Uses a type of radar for active target guidance from a Homing Launcher
An active-guidance homing missile launcher. Once launched, the target must be tracked by the launcher until impact. Can be distracted by flares.
Building blocks of a hive, taken from a natural beehive. Can be cooked in a furnace to guarantee honey, or extracted for honey and a small chance of a nucleus.
A hoodie.
Will suck up any dropped items in it's radius while powered
Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.
An inflatable horse costume. Acting as a replacement for wooden pants, you can equip this item to look as silly as possible.
Fresh and fertile.
Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the "Claim" option
A tool used to make fluid connections between objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection.
A Hot Air Balloon.
Armor for the Hot Air Balloon
A 6-meter by 3-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
A human skull.
Tasty hunters pie, made with real deer. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Reduces bleeding for a short time.
Hunting Bow, useful for short to medium range combat and hunting.
This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage when fired over long distances.
This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage when fired over long distances.
Ice-covered high damage machine rifle.
A metal plate covering your torso, provides excellent protection from all forms of attacks.
A protective facemask which provides the user with excellent head protection from all forms of attacks.
An block of ice you can sculpt.
Every home needs a chair. A decorative item which provides comfort while seated.
Ignites nearby objects such as furnaces and campfires when power is received
A makeshift balaclava. Cost effective protection from the cold, but unremarkable at preventing melee and projectile damage.
A makeshift metal shield, sturdy but only protects a small area. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.
A dart that slows your target and blocks their vision briefly.
Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.
A fire-tipped bolt for a ballista, wrapped in burning cloth, ignites upon impact.
Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.
Creates flames upon impact.
Combines three separate industrial connections into one connection.
Moves an item from one container to another.
Attaches to a workbench to allow automated crafting.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.
Splits an industrial connection into three separate connections.
A small light source.
An inflated tube for aquatic activities.
An inflated tube for aquatic activities.
An inflated tube for aquatic activities.
An instant camera. Take photos with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and change focus mode with reload.
A rugged jacket, will help keep you warm. High cold protection but incompatible with other chest attire.

A Pneumatic Jackhammer to blast through ore nodes. The sheer power of this device requires no aiming as all weak spots will be instantly destroyed. Works well on human flesh. Can be refilled at a Workbench.
A Lantern. Place it where you need light.
A Lantern. Place it where you need light.
A jar of honey. Good for reducing hunger and radiation, or could be saved for recipes. The source of the glass jar is a mystery.
Take advantage of the unique acoustics of the Jerry Can Guitar to play some rustic tunes.
A Jumpsuit
Jungle Relic themed high damage machine rifle.
A Jungle Rock. The most basic melee weapon and gathering tool.
An array of pots, pans and buckets that passes as a serviceable Drum Kit. Three cymbals, some Tom Drums and a Kick Drum means you can easily lay down a beat.
An improvised wooden kayak. Seats two and requires a Paddle to operate.

Place on a door to avoid any unwelcome guests. To craft your key first place the lock on a door and hold E while looking at the Key lock and select 'Create Key', a key will now be added to your crafting queue. If the key is lost, you cannot make another, so don't forget to make extras and put them in a safe place!
A well made collection of scrap metal formed into a knights armour.
A medieval knights helmet. Made from scrap metal. Excellent craftmanship.
A well made set of knights plate that covers the hips and thighs. Made of scrap metal.
A military grade high powered, long range rifle with great accuracy.
A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.
A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.
A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.
A Lantern. Place it where you need light, requires low grade fuel to work.
A large, animated neon sign!
A larger military backpack that can hold items inside it
A large banner hanging on a wall.
A large banner hanging on a pole.
Large Candles
Four-socket vehicle chassis.
Dual module large flatbed.
Used to smelt large quantities of ore. Difficult to secure, must be placed on terrain.
A large trophy stand to mount the head of killed animals or enemies.
A massive haul. Contains the best halloween loot
A large medkit that heals you to max health over time and stops any bleeding instantly. Guarantees 100% recovery from the wounded state if placed in your toolbar.
A large neon sign!
A large frame for your photos.
A large planter with enough room to plant 9 seeds.
A Large Present, the best there is. Unwrap it now!
A Large Rechargeable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.
A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.
Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 48 items.
A 3-meter by 1.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
A gate which allows power to flow while a player is in the beam
A small device that shoots out visible lasers in time to music.
Lavender ID Tag
Lead insert that adds radiation protection for crafted clothes and armor.
Leather from an animal. Used in many clothing items and more.
Gloves made out of leather, offers a small amount of protection to the upper body.
Legacy Bow, useful for short to medium range combat and hunting.
Legacy Furnace
The classic s*** shack. A great starter base for any fresh spawn. You can only have one shelter deployed at anytime.
Slightly faster, slightly weaker. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
Slightly faster, slightly weaker. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
Slightly faster, slightly weaker. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
A large light up frame
A medium Light-up frame
A small light-up frame
A standing light-up frame
A large light-up mirror
A medium light-up mirror
A small light-up mirror
A standing light-up mirror
A locker for keeping your clothes and armor safe!
A powerful locomotive.
Long sleeve tshirt, versatile clothing for protection against damage and the elements.
A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with good range and high damage.
Low Grade Fuel, used to power light sources.
A low quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.
A low quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.
Low quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.
Low quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
Low quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
Stalk your enemies with this high powered light assault rifle.
A lumberjack themed hoodie, earned by helping the Lumberjack. Offers the same protection as the standard hoodie.
A Lumberjack Suit
A Chinese themed New Year themed metal Spear
A Lunar New Year themed decorative wall divider with floral inlay
A Lunar New Year themed decorative wall divider with geometric inlay
A Lunar New Year themed decorative wall divider with swirling inlay
A semi automatic military issue shotgun
Military grade semi auto rifle
A semi-automatic Pistol. Fires rapidly and with good accuracy. Military Grade
High damage, high rate of fire, belt fed light machine gun.
A powerful 2-handed melee weapon, It's unique design makes it easier to hit your target when compared to other more traditional weapons.
A brutal weapon with good range.
A Mailbox that accepts notes. Only you can access the mail due to a one way slit.
Heal yourself or others with this syringe. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.
Medieval themed high damage machine rifle.
A medieval barricade. Designed to block paths and provide defensive cover as well as being an effective tool to fortify your base.
Keep your things in this medieval themed wooden storage box. Stores up to 48 items.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.
An animated neon sign!
Three-socket vehicle chassis.
A balanced head. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
A balanced set of legs. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
A balanced torso. Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.
Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a Large loot bag, containing the best loot
A medium neon sign!
A medium present, might be good! Collect 5 to upgrade to a larger present.
A medium quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.
A medium quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.
Medium quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.
Medium quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.
Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.
A Medium Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.
A 2-meter by 1-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
A megaphone that lets you broadcast your voice. [attack] to activate your voice.

A 1 bit storage component. SET input will set the value to 1 CLEAR input sets the value to 0. Output will provide connected power if value is 1, Inverted output will provide connected power if value is 0. This is also known as a D-Type Flip Flop
Metal insert for crafted clothing and armor, provides extra protection from projectiles.
A tough metal barricade with barbed wire, made from Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.
A Metal Blade for making melee weapons.
A metal plate covering your torso, provides excellent protection from all forms of attacks.

Detects metal objects which may otherwise be hidden. When the light flashes, or you hear a beep, aim to search for items. Increase the bar until a flag appears. Dig at the flag with a melee item to reveal what it is. Different areas yield different rewards
A protective facemask which provides the user with excellent head protection from all forms of attacks.
Metal Fragments. Smelted from Metal Ore, used in lots of different crafting recipes.
Static shutter that forms a metal horizontal embrasure over your window frame.
A naturally occurring rock containing metal and metal compounds. You can extract this metal using a furnace.
Metal Pipe.
A large sturdy metal shield, keeps arrows and bullets at bay. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.
A bulletproof shop front for secure trades.
A metal spring. Used to provide motion or resistance in objects.
Static shutter that forms a metal vertical embrasure over your window frame.
Metal window bars made to fit a normal sized window.
A powered microphone that lets you broadcast your voice. Press [+attack2] to change voice mode between high and low pitch.
A Military grade flamethrower. Uses low grade fuel as ammunition.
Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash.
A small planter with enough room to plant 2 seeds.
A leather cap with a flashlight attached. It uses Low Grade Fuel and can be activated from the inventory.
A very accurate ranged weapon with a rotating barrel.
A military issue belt-fed machine gun with that must be spun up to fire. Fires rapidly once spun up at the expense of movement speed.
A backpack designed to store ammunition for a minigun.
Extracts minerals from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of minerals available for extraction in any given area.
A Small group of edible fish.
Mint ID Tag
Used for mixing recipes.
M270 Multiple Launch Rocket System
An aiming system computer module for an MLRS vehicle.
A rocket intended for use in an MLRS (Multiple Launch Rocket System).
A mobile phone that lets you place calls from anywhere. Truly cutting edge Cobalt technology. Use [attack] to access the dialer.
This allows you to modify modular vehicles
A glass bottle filled with low grade fuel. Smashes and spreads fire when it lands, incredibly high damage to wood and players but innefective against stronger materials.
A motorbike.
A motorbike with sidecar.
A ballista mounted on wheels, designed for mobility and capable of firing bolts at distant targets. Can be towed by horses.
A magnificent moustache for Movember
A medium damage machine gun.
A 40MM six barrel, semi automatic grenade launcher
A classic halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.
A mummy suit
A Mushroom found on the ground. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
Increases weapon fire rate by channeling gasses back into the weapon cycling it faster, at the cost of bullet accuracy.
Lowers recoil felt by the operator but can make bullet path more unpredictable and dealing slightly less damage to your foes.
A construction tool turned deadly
Standard nailgun ammunition
An extremely silly easter nest hat with googly eyes.
Netting you can climb.
Ring in the Lunar new year with a massive gong!
Enables vision at nighttime by projecting and amplifying infrared light.The batteries can be recharged at a Lvl 2 workbench. Cannot be worn with a helmet.
BaboAbe Ninja Suit
A nomad suit.
A scrap of paper for leaving notes.
A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
Melee weapon crafted from obsidian. Good for harvesting carcases.
Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash. Fashioned out of an old oil filter, this won't last long.
A one sided town sign post, that you can plant into terrain.
A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst
Orange ID Tag
A rare fish found in the depths of the ocean. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.
Smells nice.
A clipping of an orchid plant.
Orchid seeds can be found when picking wild Orchids.
A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if EITHER input receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source
A outbreak scientist suit
An outbreak sprayer used by scientists
An Ox mask to celebrate the 2021 Lunar New Year.
A versatile melee weapon that can also be used to paddle a kayak.
A small inflatable pool that you can fill up with water.
Some simple painted eggs. Collect 10 to upgrade to a bronze egg
A set of repurposed PVC pipes that can be used to play a variety of melodies.
A pair of pants, highly capable undergarment for your legs. Great all round protection from damage and the elements.
Paper, a ingredient for Building plan and Note.

Helps you figure out where you are. You can annotate the map by right-clicking and drawing on it. Drag the map into your belt bar to make it active. You will then be able to view the map by holding down the map button (G by default).
Once equipped, press [+jump] while in mid-air to pull the cord. Must be repacked after use. Must be at least 15m above the ground in order to deploy.
Deployed version of parachute. Hidden.
A very stupid looking party hat
Dual module seating.
A special boomer which allows you light up the night sky with a custom pattern that you draw. Multiple colors and altitude settings are available.
A photograph taken with an instant camera.
A Pickaxe, useful for gathering ore from rocks.
Cucumbers in a vinegar bath, jarred by an amateur. Eat at your own risk.
A piercing bolt for a ballista, capable of penetrating armored vehicles.
Batter up!
Pink ID Tag

A tool used to make connections between industrial objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. Holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.
Ammunition for a Pistol. Loses velocity when fired over long distances resulting in slightly decreased damage.
A 3 pronged pitchfork. Extremely easy to hit targets with.
A wide-impact bolt for a ballista, covering a large area while dealing moderate damage.
Fiber from dead plants. Can be composted.
Toot your own horn with this brassy improvised Trumpet.
A companion that reminds you of your youth.
Tempting pork pie, provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Improves healing rate from other sources for a short time.
A portable Boom Box that can play tapes and internet audio streams. [attack] to start/stop and [attack2] to modify settings.
A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.
A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.
Potato.
A Clipping of a Potato Plant.

These potato seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more potatoes and faster growth.
A device that converts salt water to fresh water while powered.
A gate which allows power to flow while a player is standing on it
A prison cell gate to lock things behind bars
A prison cell wall.
A hood for prisoners, restricts vision.
An explosive propane-filled keg, devastating to structures. Can be placed or used as a projectile in a catapult.
A protype pistol with a built-in 3 round burst fire mode. Strong in close quarters. Swap between single shot and burst with [+firemode]
A prototype field hatchet, useful for gathering wood
A prototype field pickaxe. Useful for gathering ore from rocks.
A CCTV Camera system can be used for realtime surveillance and security when paired with the Computer Station. This camera has pan, tilt, and zoom capability.
Extracts oil from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of oil available for extraction in any given area.
An edible vegetable that can also be worn as a hat. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A pumpkin basket to help you collect candy much faster during Trick or Treat events with left click. Use right click to throw candy
Spooky pumpkin pie, provides a boost to health, hunger and hydration. Increases maximum health for a short time.
A Clipping of a pumpkin plant.

Pumpkin Seeds can be found when picking wild Pumpkin plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more pumpkins and faster growth.
A Shotgun. Fires six rounds.
A pure tea that provides hydration and temporarily increases your resistance to radiation a large amount.
A pure cooling tea that temporarily decreases your max and core temperature.
A pure crafting tea. provides hydration and increases the chances of a higher quality crafting outcome for a short time.
A pure harvesting tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases the amount of resources you receive from harvesting corpses a large amount.
A pure healing tea, provides hydration and heals you a large amount over time.
A pure health tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts maximum health a large amount.
A pure ore tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases your yield when harvesting ores a large amount.
A tea that removes some radiation.
A pure scrap tea, temporarily increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels a large amount.
A pure warming tea that temporarily increases both your core and minimum temperature.
A pure wood tea, temporarily increases the yield from cutting trees a large amount.
Purple ID Tag
Sunglasses - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.
A High Powered six-shooter.
A Beautifully crafted Rabbit mask to celebrate the 2023 Lunar New Year
A dart that applies stackable radiation.
Glowing water. Consuming will damage your health and irradiate you.
A tea that removes some radiation.
A large planter with enough room to plant 9 seeds.
This switch will allow passthrough based on a random number. Each time the SET input receives power it will roll true or false to allow passthrough
A Beautifully crafted bronze and gold Rat mask to celebrate the 2020 Lunar New Year
Raw Bear Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw Big Cat Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw chicken breast. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw Crocodile Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw Fish.
Raw Horse Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw human meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Raw pork. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw Snake Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
Raw Wolf Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.
A reactive target that knocks down when hit, can be reset.
Single module seating for two passengers.
A red berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.
A clipping of a Red Berry Plant.

These red berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.
A very large mortar type firework with a red starburst
Red Dog Tags
Red ID Tag
A small red light source.
A keycard with advanced clearance, grants access to top level areas
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of red balls into the air
Emits a beautiful shower of red sparks
A festive reindeer antlers headband and nose.
Window bars to fit a standard window. These bars are made out of reinforced metal and contain a thick surround to protect from incoming projectiles.
A basic wooden shield with added protection, keeps you safe but not for long. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.
You can repair your items here for a fraction of their construction cost. You may also use this to apply new skins to existing items.
Use this item in a Research Bench to create blueprints of items.
You can use this table to learn how to permanently craft items you have found in exchange for scrap.

Transform your tool cupboard experience with this modified Hi-Fi cabinet. Complete with retro displays indicating vital base data as well as frosted glass doors allowing you to view its contents of tools and resources!
A standard eight shot revolver.
An RF Broadcaster
An RF Pager. An audible tone will be produced when a signal is picked up on the listening frequency. Can be set to silent mode.
An RF Receiver
A hand held RF signal broadcaster. Left click to broadcast. Configurable with right mouse.
The firing mechanism of a rifle. Used in construction of a weapon that can fire 5.56 ammo fully automatic.
A makeshift riot Helmet. Great at deflecting melee attacks.
Gloves made out of metal, offer a good amount of protection to the upper body.
A full body armor for a horse. Provides strong protection for you and your steed, at the cost of greatly reduced movement speed.
A shoddy piece of body armor made from roadsigns.
A shoddy piece of leg armor made from roadsigns. Moderate protection from melee and projectiles.
Some road signs made of metal.
A Rock. The most basic melee weapon and gathering tool.
Ammunition for a Rocket Launcher. A short to medium range self-propelled, unguided rocket which deals large splash damage on impact.
Shoots rockets slightly farther than North Korea.
A rocking chair that responds to your input. Don't fire whilst seated.

This object combines two root electrical sources into a single signal. Helpful for stringing together low energy batteries or solar panels to produce higher power output. Can be wired in series, can not be used with any non energy producing electrical components.
A Length of Rope.
Romantic AF.
A clipping of a rose plant.
Rose seeds can be found when picking wild Roses.
A rotten apple. Eating it currently provides a tiny boost to health, hunger, and thirst.
A decorative rug that can be placed on walls, floors, and ceilings. Provides comfort when in close proximity.
A decorative rug that can be placed on walls, floors, and ceilings. Provides comfort when in close proximity.
A beautiful hand crafted white gold and sapphire encrusted egg, with a miniature monument contained inside.
A beautiful hand crafted cerulean and gold egg, with a miniature cargo ship scene contained inside.
A beautiful hand crafted gold and green egg, with a miniature traincart contained inside.
A beautiful hand crafted Ivory and gold egg, with a miniature monument contained inside.
A beautiful hand crafted purple egg with gold lace, a miniature offshore monument is contained inside.
An exquisite hand crafted gold and diamond egg. When opened, a very special melody can be heard as you observe an intricate representation of your favorite monument.
A beautiful hand crafted gold and white egg, with a miniature underwater lab scene contained inside.
Equipping this saddle bag will add extra storage space on your horse
A large Salmon, found in fresh and salt water. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.
Water with a high salt content. Consuming will damage your health.
A high-yield resource gathering axe. Slower than the Hatchet.
A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with high damage.
A Hammer made from a bunch of other crap.
A high-yield resource gathering Icepick.
Shelves for item stacking
A powerful melee weapon made from a filed-down wrench. Great durability, good damage.
Ammunition for a SAM Site. This missile contains a rudimentary guidance system to help it navigate through strong winds.
A surface to air rocket site. Requires 25 electricity to function.
A protective barricade made out of Sand Bags.
A santa beard. Ho Ho ho.
A santa hat. Ho Ho ho.
A small oily fish, commonly found in large schools.
Small explosive package constructed of beancan grenades. Useful for destroying wood and sheet metal doors.
Get into the halloween spirit with this decorative deployable item.
A spooky scarecrow suit
A creepy burlap scarecrow hat
A spread shot dart that fires multiple smaller darts.
A cluster of heavy rock projectiles for a catapult. Wide spread, pure kinetic damage on impact.
A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
Scrap can be used in a Research table and Workbench to unlock and research items. Often used as a currency throughout the world.
A large scrap frame
A medium scrap frame
A small scrap frame
A standing scrap frame
A large scrap mirror
A medium scrap mirror
A small scrap mirror
A standing scrap mirror
A Large, wide beam, aimable light source.
A luxurious, comfortable chair for long sessions of CCTV watching.
A small device that detects vibrations within a set range. Will output a different power value depending on the explosive type detected, ideal to know when your time has come.
The firing mechanism of a semi automatic weapon.
A semi-automatic pistol, fires rapidly and with good accuracy.
A Semi Automatic Rifle.
A Sewing kit. Used to make advanced clothing.
Sheet metal scraps.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.
Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.
A smart casual shirt. Might make you look more trustworthy. Moderate clothing for protection against damage and the elements.
Ensure 100% Tool Cupboard uptime with this Tool Cupboard skin.
A shop front to do commerce.
A short wall made of solid ice.
Trusty pair of shorts, may provide a breeze in undesired places. Worse than their full length counterparts with only basic protection from damage and the elements.
A shotgun trap triggered by movement, place near doorways and load with handmade shells.
A shovel for digging up stuff
Use this stringed together shovel to play some deep, deep tunes.
A very sharp curved cutting weapon. While its traditional role was to cut grass, this tool is also extremely versatile at cutting throats, perhaps trees, too.
A rolling siege tower, providing cover and access to enemy bases. Can be locked with your own door. Can be towed by horses.
A Silver Egg. Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a gold Egg
A poorly made sight, slightly better than iron sights.
A simple debugging light
A horse saddle with one seat. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the "Claim" option
A single plant pot.
Single Shallow Wall Shelves
A single sign post that you can plant into terrain.
A spinning siren light
A sharp skinning knife. Extremely good at harvesting flesh and can produce trophies that can be mounted on Hunting Trophies.
A Military-Grade Semi Automatic Rifle.
A spooky skull
A spooky skull door knocker
Enjoy burning your enemies remnants to ashes with this Halloween exclusive! Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.
A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.
A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.
A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.
A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.
A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.
A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.
A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.
A beautiful sky lantern. Can be launched in any direction. Has one inventory slot. Can be Ignited with a lit torch.
A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.
A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.
A sleeping bag. Placing this will give you or an assigned player a place to respawn, with a long cooldown.
A small, makeshift backpack
Small Candles
Two-socket vehicle chassis.
A small electric generator powered by Low Grade Fuel that outputs 40 power.
A trophy stand to mount the head of killed animals or enemies.
Open for a surprise, or collect 10 to upgrade to a medium loot bag containing better loot!
A small neon sign!
A small refinery which can produce Low Grade Fuel from Crude Oil.
A small planter with enough room to plant 3 seeds.
A small stocking stuffer present, Collect 10 to upgrade to a larger present.
A small rechargable battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.
A small, surprisingly aggressive deep sea predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.
A hidden, burried stash to keep your items safe. After placing, return to the stash and aim at the ground where you hid it and it will reveal itself.
A small stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get a gift! Collect 6 to upgrade to a SUPER Stocking.
A Small Trout. Good for a few meals.
A Small Water Bottle. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out.
Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.
A 1-meter by 0.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.
Sends a notifications to your phone when powered on.
A smart electric switch.
The firing mechanism of a submachinegun. Used in construction of a weapon that can fire pistol ammo fully automatic.
Produces a large cloud of opaque greyish white smoke.
Emits thick, visibility blocking smoke upon impact.
A Beautifully crafted Snake mask to celebrate the 2025 Lunar New Year
The venom of a snake. Used to create Incapacitate darts.
A metal trap that can injure or even kill people when stepped on. Can be picked up after been triggered.
A snowball, throw it!
Load snowballs and lay waste to your foes with Christmas cheer.
A thick, high visibility Jacket. It will help keep you warm in any climate.
A machine which will blanket the surrounding terrain in snow.
Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative snowman
A snowman helmet which provides ample protection.
A custom snowmobile, made of various bits and pieces.
Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash. Crudely made out of a soda can, this will only survive a few shots.
A comfortable old sofa. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.
A comfortable old sofa with a floral pattern. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.
A small one-person submarine.
A light that will pulse in time to music when connected to a Boom Box.
A collection of used piping that’s been converted into a Tuba. Probably not very hygienic.
A spacesuit built for harsh conditions.
A semi automatic military issue shotgun
A speargun which can only be fired underwater. Excellent for hunting Sharks.
Ammunition for a speargun.
Giant Cobwebs which can be hung against both a ceiling and a wall.
An interactive spinning wheel.
Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.
Spoiled Bear Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Big Cat Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Chicken. Eating it will damage your health.
Spoiled Crocodile Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Deer Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Fish Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Horse Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Human Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Pork Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
A spoiled fruit or vegetable. It's so far gone it's hard to tell what it originally was.
Spoiled Snake Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.
Frighten your guests with creepy and spooky halloween sounds!
Use the Spray Can to leave Tags or reskin your items. Press [attack] to spray and [attack2] to reskin items.
A small sprinkler that sprays water around it. Requires a hose connection to supply it with water.
A golden star to top off your Christmas Tree
Some long, some short.
A protective barricade made out of Stones.
A stone fireplace to heat your home. Must be placed indoors and against a wall.
Primitive tool used for harvesting wood from trees and logs.
Primitive tool used for harvesting Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore.
Harvested from rocks using tools, basic building material.
A stone-tipped wooden Spear. Slightly longer range.
Attach to a storage container to allow industrial input/output connections.
Keep your things in this wooden barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.
Keep your things in this wooden barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.
The Storage Monitor attaches to the Tool Cupboard and Large Storage Box to monitor the container contents. Output sends a pulse when the container is updated.
Single module storage.
Bulletproof glass insert
A flashing light, 3 speeds. Causes seizures.

Sulfur is commonly used in gunpowder, medicine, and matches. Matches release sulfur dioxide when they burn, giving them their smell. Sulfur is an essential component to living cells. Many proteins contain sulfur. It is also used as a pesticide on organic farms.
A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.
Very tall.
A clipping of a sunflower plant.
Sunflower seeds can be found when picking wild Sunflowers.
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!
A corroded sunken knife designed for close combat engagements, can attack while sprinting. Best in class at harvesting flesh.
Super Serum, more ore, more wood, more scrap
A SUPER Stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get an awesome gift!
Purple signal smoke. Use to mark a location for an airdrop.
A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead while rising to the water's surface.
A Surgeon Suit
Use this on the terrain to see which resources are available for mining.
Traps fish, place on the shore and load with bait. The more bait loaded the bigger the chance of catching Trout.
It's people. Survivor's pie is made out of people. Provides a boost to health, hunger and hydration. Increases yield when harvesting corpses for a short time.
A simple electric switch.
Every home needs a table. A decorative item which provides comfort when in close proximity.
Military issue tactical gloves provide protection as well as weapon stabilization leading to higher accuracy when used.
A tall canvas for artists paintings.
Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.
A tank top, comes with free stains. Basic protection, but better than nothing.
An internal weapon mod that allows the user to send pings to their team while the weapon is equipped.
A computer loaded with software that can analyze a video and produce rotational deltas to individual objects contained in the feed.
A waterproof tarp.
Single module seating for two passengers, with protection at the front.
A collection of random tech parts.
Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!
An electrical trap that zaps nearby players when powered. More power supplied will result in higher damage. Loses durability with use.
A Mailbox that accepts notes. Only you can access the mail due to a one way slit.
A medium damage machine gun.
A special tiger mask to celebrate Chinese New Year
C4, useful for breaking into bases.
A Timer switch, will pass power through for duration.
A primitive perimeter alarm made from hanging tin cans. Clatters loudly when disturbed, alerting you to any trespassers. Simple but effective.
An old snowmobile from around 1980.
Placing and authorising with the cupboard will make it so only you can build in a 50 meter radius of it. If you want your friends to build, they'll need to auth too. You should protect this.
A Torch. Lights your way at night and can be used as a weapon.
A wall mounted holder for torches.
A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead in a straight line.
A tree isn't complete without colorful lights!
A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.
A triangle planter with enough room to plant 4 seeds.
A triangle planter with enough room to plant 4 seeds.
A three-wheeled bicycle.
A tshirt, simple undergarment. Good protection from damage and the elements.
A makeshift wall light. Still smells faintly of fish.
Twitch Rivals Desk
A wearable flag for Twitch Rivals
A purple hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.
A trophy dedicated to the survivors of Rust Twitch Rivals
A trophy dedicated to the survivors of Rust Twitch Rivals 2023
A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.
A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.
A double sided town sign post, with roof, that you can plant into terrain.
A Two-Way mirror
Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 48 items.
A stake adorned with special properties making it able to release the soul of undead creatures with a single strike, as well as yield extra loot from their remains.
A large military-grade scope that can be configured from 4x zoom to 16x zoom.
Trade your goods with other players safely by creating sell and buy orders. If a raider gains access to the rear panel, they will have free reign over all of your goodies. Keep it safe.
A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst
A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Violet balls into the air
Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks
A bottle of Russian Vodka.
A train car.
A walkie talkie set to an unknown channel
Transform your base from a rusty shack to a cozy hideout with this sleek wallpaper. A nice touch of style - until the next raid, at least.

Transform your base from a rusty shack to a cozy hideout! This tool lets you apply wallpaper on walls, floors and ceilings. A nice touch of style - until the next raid, at least. Press [+attack2] to select your skin.
A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.
A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.
A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.
A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.
A high wooden watchtower with a ladder
Water. Drinking it will alleviate your thirst.
A storage container for water. Can output 10ml of water a second via a hose.
A bucket for transporting water or other liquids.
A large water gun with pumpable pressure. Hold reload to pump!
A large jerry can for all kinds of water. Holds up to 5000ml. Careful not to throw it all away!
A Shotgun. Fires a single round before reloading.
A small water gun that doesn't require pumping, but has a lower range and output.
Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entities.
A Water Purifier. Place overtop of a campfire. Will provide clean, drinkable water from salty, or stagnant water.
A green jumpsuit and gasmask worn by the waterwell NPC
Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a beam of light. Pressing F (default) to toggle light.
Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a guiding laser and reduces weapon sway.
A weapon rack light.
A weapon rack light.
Holds weaponry haphazardly, a charmingly chaotic addition to your virtual armory.
A hat made of wellipets boots
A Wetsuit providing protection from frigid waters.
A bundle of wheat. Edible, but better off in a cooking recipe.
A Clipping of a Wheat Plant.
Wheat seeds, found when eating wheat or harvesting wild crops. Plant in the ground or a planter to grow more. Seeds grown in good conditions will have higher yields and grow faster.
The Piano is a repurposed wheelbarrow that weighs a ton, but makes up for it with a wide range of notes.
A white berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.
A clipping of a White Berry Plant.

These white berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.
White ID Tag
Emits a beautiful shower of white sparks
Keep your things in this wicker barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.
Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.
Converts kinetic energy harvested from the wind into electricity. Amount generated will vary depending on wind speed. Higher altitudes will yield stronger winds.

A tool used to make connections between electrical objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. Holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.
A headdress made out of the scraped out head of a wolf.
A wolf skull.
Wood. Collected from trees and used in many crafting recipes. It's also needed to cook in camp-fires.
Gloves made out of wood and leather, offers some protection to the upper body.
A shoddy helmet made from simple materials, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.
A shoddy piece of leg armor made from simple materials, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.
A shoddy piece of body armor made from simple materials, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.
A basic damage dart.

A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal. The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.
Wood insert for crafted clothes and armor, provides some extra protection from bullets and melee.
An arrow for a Hunting Bow and Crossbow.
A wooden barricade. Will hurt players and animals that run into it.
Perfect for cover when engaging in gun fights. Decays rapidly when placed outside of building privilege.
A wooden cross marking the remains of an unknown soul

A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal. The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.
A set of spikes that will slow down and hurt anyone that walks over them.
Hand-carved, rugged bar doors embody the spirit of the frontier. A must-have for any survivor.
A full body armor for a horse made of wood. Provides moderate protection for you and your steed, but with a reduction in movement speed.
A ladder will help you climb walls in any base.
A basic wooden shield, won't last very long. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.
Primitive weapon, perfect for hunting your foes. Can be upgraded to Stone Spear.
Window bars made out of wood. They'll stop people climbing through your window, but probably not for very long.
A large wooden frame
A medium wooden frame
A small wooden frame
A standing wooden frame
A large wooden mirror
A medium wood mirror
A small wooden mirror
A standing wooden mirror
Wood shutters that you can open and close.
Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 18 items.
This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 1
This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 2
This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 3
A service train designed to run on an underground rail system.
A small, writhing worm that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.
A lazily wrapped gift.
Use this to conceal any item in a lazily wrapped gift
An extra large canvas for artists paintings.

An exclusive-or logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power, passthrough amount is whichever single input is active. If BOTH inputs recieve power, passthrough will be zero.
A double extra large canvas for artists paintings.
A selection of bones that were “acquired” for their acoustic attributes. Play a lullaby for your camp with these soothing tones.
A yellow berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.
A clipping of a Yellow Berry Plant.

These yellow berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food. Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.
Yellow ID Tag
A Yellow Perch, commonly found in freshwater rivers.
